XII.ii.3.A.3.b
.
Criteria for the Automatic Issuance of the Forms
VA Form 21P-8924
is automatically released by the central system computer if
there is a running Dependency and Indemnity Compensation award, and
the payee is a
surviving spouse whose youngest child or children (in the case of twins) will reach age 16 within two months of the current processing month
child whose 18
th
birthday is two months from the current processing month, or
surviving spouse with a child whose 18
th
birthday is two months from the current processing month.
